feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 PM MST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 06:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 March 2023
